title: Build People Up With Your Words | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Build People Up With Your Words | Victoria Osteen
description:
Good relationships are built on what we’re willing to give more than what we’re willing to receive. Be someone who uses your words to build others up today! When you extend grace, you will receive grace in return.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
